data.title: Arizona Summit on Artificial Intelligence, Law, and the Courts
data.meta_description: Join leading local and national technology experts as they explore the implications and future trends in artificial intelligence and its relevancy to the law, legal profession, ethics, and the courts. The day-long summit will feature panel discussions, breakout sessions, keynote address and closing reception.
data.text:
NOW AVAILABLE: Topic Overviews and Summit Materials

Certificate of Attendance: Download Now

Event Information (Sold Out)

When: Monday, December 11, 2023

Location: 111 E. Taylor Street, Phoenix, AZ | Sandra Day O'Connor College of Law (parking map)

Speakers & Panelists

Chief Justice Robert Brutinel, Arizona Supreme Court

Benjamin Taylor, President, State Bar of Arizona

Dean Stacy Leeds, Arizona State University Sandra Day O'Connor College of Law

Prof. Subbarao Kambhampati, Arizona State University

Prof. Colleen Chien, Co-director Berkeley Center for Law and Technology, Berkeley Law School

Whitney Stefko Dover, Ford Motor Company

Darth Vaughn, Ford Motor Company

Prof. Gary Marchant, Arizona State University

Joseph Tiano, Legal Decoder

Hon. Samuel Thumma, Arizona Court of Appeals, Division One

Prof. Cas Laskowski, University of Arizona James E. Rogers College of Law

Prof. Christopher L. Griffin, Jr., University of Arizona James E. Rogers College of Law

Mark Lanterman, Computer Forensic Services

Prof. Malik Khalid, Oakland University

Aaron Judy, Office of the Maricopa County Clerk of the Superior Court

Roger Strand, COSCA

Sara Omundson, Arizona Supreme Court

Hotel Accommodations

A block of rooms has been secured at two hotels within close proximity to the Sandra Day O'Connor College of Law.

The Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Downtown (map) has a nightly rate of $151 (plus tax). To reserve your room at this hotel call 602.343.0006 or visit Available Rooms - Hilton Garden Inn Phoenix Downtown by November 24, 2023.

The Hampton Inn and Suites (map) has a nightly rate of $156 (plus tax). To reserve your room at this hotel call 602.710.1240 or visit ARIZONA SUPREME COURT (hilton.com) by November 11, 2023.
